title: The Accidental Recluse
description: Johnny Jackson used to be a famous film director, but his brother Duke was a hero. Just turned 75, JJ is heading home from exile in Japan for one last blockbuster and a civic honouring. But home is where the ghosts of his past reside, some darker than his dead brotherâ€™s shadow. His sins may be about to come to light.
author: Tom McCulloch
